name: Alone In Space (itch) (MrForbas)
description:
In this small little game, you play as a maintenance crew on a  spaceship on a inter-stellar voyage.

Do small and quick check-ups on the spaceships system, but you may not be alone like you taught.

This game was made in a week for the Brackey's Game Jam 2022.2.

It is my first attempt as using Blender to make models.

I hope you enjoy this small little game.
